physical_appearance: This is a coloured print and the image captures a bustling open air roadside market place. Vendors spread out their items on a piece of cloth on the ground and sit behind them so as to meet the gaze of the buyer. Electric cords are seen hanging across buildings. On the verso there are two labels; one being the photographer's studio label (with its address) and the other by The Song Heng Association Singapore & Overseas Hainanese Artists Art Exhibition 2010.
sgcool_label_text: Ho Koon Sang was a member of the Photographic Society of Singapore and an Associate of the Royal Photographic Society in London. This is a very early and unique print shot on colour film.
context_1: An exhibition was held to commemorate 70 years of establishment
context_21: 82 Macpherson Lane #09-23, Singapore 360082  Sungei Road Flea Market  11 Purvis Street, Singapore 188590
subject_terms_1: marketplaces roadsides flea markets street vendors  colour photography  genre (visual works)
context_20: Address found on the photography studio's label (verso)
subject_terms_2: Marketplaces Street vendors  Photography, Artistic  Genre prints
